person_say: I didn't do well on my exam, and it's making me feel really discouraged. How can I regain my confidence?
animal_say: Oh no! It sounds like you could use a boost of confidence. There's a wise bear named Bruno who specializes in mindfulness and can help you regain your inner strength. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to learn from him how to regain my inner strength.
animal_say: Awesome! I'm connecting you with Bruno now. He's ready to help you find that inner strength and confidence!
